items.question: What is the AI Hugging Video Generator?
items.answer: It is an automated tool that combines two portraits into a warm hugging animation with realistic motion and lighting.

items.question: How do I create a hugging video?
items.answer: Upload two clear portraits, pick a template or add custom prompts, then generate and download your clip.

items.question: Do I need video editing skills?
items.answer: No. The interface is beginner friendly—follow the guided steps and export instantly.

items.question: Where can I use the results?
items.answer: Share on social media, celebrate milestones, enrich brand campaigns, or keep as a personal memory.

items.question: What photos work best?
items.answer: Use well-lit images where each person faces the camera. Half-body portraits in JPG or PNG deliver optimal results.

items.question: Is it free to use?
items.answer: Core features are free. Premium resolutions or branded presets may require additional credits.
